The store-house of breuitie in vvoorkes of arithemetike containyng aswell the soundrie partes of the science in whole and broken numbers, with the rules of proportion, furthered to profitable vse: as also sunderie rules of breuitie of worke, of rare, pleasaunte, and commodious effecte, set forthe by Dionis Gray of London goldsmith. 1577. [Gray, Dionis, fl. 1577].
[8], 79, 72-88, 87-118 leaves
[By J. Kingston] for William Norton, and Ihon Harison, dwellyng in Paules Church-yard, Imprinted at Lo[n]don : [1577]
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
